txt.en: Goblin-town has long been a thorn in the side of the free peoples in Rhovanion. Once again, the goblin horde inside stirsâ€¦.\n\nYour mission is to find the Great Goblin's treasure somewhere in Goblin-town.
You have been tasked with finding a great treasure somewhere in Goblin-town.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'The scouts keeping watch on Goblin-town have returned with interesting news. There is rumour circulating among the goblins of their king's lost treasure. It seems when the previous Great Goblin was dispatched by the Great Eagle, the knowledge of where this treasure was hidden died with him! Hah! Well his loss is our gain! Get in there and find it!'
Complete Mission: The Great Goblin's Treasure
Your mission is to find a great treasure somewhere in Goblin-town.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Goblin-town.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
'What once was lost has now been found! Quite the haul, even for goblins! Excellent work, [placeholder]. I will make sure this is added to the war coffers and put to good use.'
You may be ambushed after completing your objective.
